headline.main: AFRICA WOUNDED HONORED; Six Officers, 96 Men Receive Purple Heart Decorations

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 2 (U.P.) -- Six Army officers and 96 enlisted men received at Walter Reed Hospital yesterday Purple Heart decorations for wounds in action.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
